meanings.definition: To increase rapidly or suddenly in amount or price.
meanings.sent1: The demand for the new video game is skyrocketing.
meanings.sent2: Prices of houses in the city are skyrocketing due to high demand.
meanings.sent3: The popularity of the new singer is skyrocketing faster than a rocket launch!
meanings.sent4: Her career is skyrocketing to new heights after winning the award.
meanings.sent5: The number of visitors to the museum is skyrocketing, breaking all previous records.

meanings.sent1: The company experienced a skyrocketing in sales last quarter.
meanings.sent2: The skyrocketing of prices caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent3: The sudden skyrocketing of balloons at the party amazed the children.
meanings.sent4: The skyrocketing of emotions during the movie made everyone tear up.
meanings.sent5: The news of the discovery led to a skyrocketing of interest in the scientific community.
